TEXT.TITLE: CALIFORNIA MICRO DEVICES <CAMD> TRADES ON NMS
TEXT.BODY: California Micro Devices Corp said its common stock is now listed on the expansion of the Nasdaq National Market System. The company said entry into NMS provides shareholders and other investors with last sale information and up-to-the-second volume information through stockbrokers. Reuter
